content: I recently made some PR that added feature flags ( #73139 - merged, #72717 - open)
as well as the two following pages (1.9 and 1.10)
I seem to have missed a lot of things, especially adding the feature flags to https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/librustc_feature/active.rs
should I do it ? (As in: should I make a PR adding the relevant things if no one noticed it when I made the PRs ?)
active.rs is for language features, not library features. You should create a tracking issue for the unstable features though.

ohhhh, ok !

You should create a tracking issue for the unstable features though.

Done, either the PR itself has become the issue or a tracking issue has been created already :slight_smile:

@Poliorcetics still create an issue. It takes a while for features to be stabilised if they are, and not having an issue makes it really hard to track it. Create an issue and link it to the (merged) pr and that should be fine
